casebody.data:
Daniel T. MORGAN, Petitioner
v.
Sheri A. MORGAN, Respondent Daniel T. Morgan, Petitioner
v.
Sheri A. Morgan, Respondent No. 710 MAL 2018
No. 711 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. March 20, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 20th day of March, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED. The Application for Order of Supreme Court to Direct Daniel T. Morgan to Post Appropriate Security Pursuant to Pennsylvania Rule of Appellate Procedure 2572(d) is DENIED AS MOOT.
